name: Entrapment
summary_text: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

name: Bewitched
summary_text: Thinking he can overshadow an unknown actress in the part, an egocentric actor unknowingly gets a witch cast in an upcoming television remake of the classic sitcom Bewitched (1964).

name: Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
summary_text: When the fate of their world, Ninjago, is challenged by great threats, it's up to the ninja: Kai, Jay, Cole, Zane, Lloyd and Nya to save the world.

name: Full Bloom
summary_text: Ten of America's budding florists vying to be crowned America's best.

name: High Ground
summary_text: In a bid to save the last of his family, Gutjuk, a young Aboriginal man, teams up with ex-soldier Travis to track down Baywara, the most dangerous warrior in the Territory, his uncle.

name: Open Your Eyes
summary_text: A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.

name: Goon
summary_text: Labeled an outcast by his brainy family, a bouncer overcomes long odds to lead a team of under performing misfits to semi-pro hockey glory, beating the crap out of everything that stands in his way.

name: Repo Man
summary_text: A young punk recruited by a car repossession agency finds himself in pursuit of a Chevrolet Malibu that is wanted for a $20,000 bounty - and has something otherworldly stashed in its trunk.

name: Mork & Mindy
summary_text: A wacky alien comes to Earth to study its residents and the life of the human woman he boards with is never the same.

name: Fall River
summary_text: Re-investigation of the murder of three young women in 1979 - Fall River, MA.

name: Out of This World
summary_text: A teenager discovers she has supernatural powers when she learns her birth father is an alien.

name: A Nice Girl Like You
summary_text: After being accused of being too inhibited by her ex-boyfriend, a violinist creates a rather wild to-do list that sends her on a whirlwind journey of self-discovery.

name: Handsome Devil
summary_text: Ned and Conor are forced to share a bedroom at their boarding school. The loner and the star athlete at this rugby-mad school form an unlikely friendship until it's tested by the authorities.

name: Jesse Stone: Stone Cold
summary_text: Jesse Stone (Selleck) is a New England police chief investigating a series of murders, in an adaptation of Robert B. Parker's novel.

name: Herbie Fully Loaded
summary_text: Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Herbie, Number 53, the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own, puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.

name: Flesh+Blood
summary_text: In medieval Europe, a young girl from a noble family is obsessed with her captors - commoners.

name: Batman: Arkham Knight
summary_text: With his back against the wall, Batman turns to his closest allies to help him save Gotham City from the clutches of Scarecrow and the Arkham Knight's army. A familiar face also returns to give The Dark Knight a message he cannot ignore.

name: The Recruit
summary_text: A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.

name: Barney & Friends
summary_text: From pretending to be a pilot on a make-believe airplane to pretending to be a pirate in search of buried treasure, Barney's friends discover that creativity lets them soar in the wings of imagination!

name: Penelope
summary_text: A modern romantic tale about a young aristocratic heiress born under a curse that can only be broken when she finds true love with "one who will accept her as one of their own."

name: Premonition
summary_text: A depressed woman learns that her husband was killed in a car accident the previous day, then awakens the next morning to find him alive and well at home; then awakens the day after that to find that he's dead.

name: Solomon Kane
summary_text: A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.

name: Four Boys and a Gun
summary_text: The moving story of 4 young men struggling against overwhelming odds to remain honest. Crooked employer shorts their earnings; they turn to crime, their first theft ending in tragedy.

name: Pusher
summary_text: A drug pusher grows increasingly desperate after a botched deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug lord.

name: Suite Française
summary_text: During the early years of Nazi occupation of France in World War II, romance blooms between Lucile Angellier (Michelle Williams), a French villager, and Lieutenant Bruno von Falk (Matthias Schoenaerts), a German soldier.

name: Ballykissangel
summary_text: An English priest is transferred to a small Irish village.

name: Tyrant
summary_text: An unassuming American family is drawn into the workings of a turbulent Middle Eastern nation.

name: I Spy
summary_text: A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.

name: Titus
summary_text: Titus returns victorious from war, only to plant the seeds of future turmoil for himself and his family.

name: Fifteen
summary_text: 'Fifteen' follows the students of fictional Hillside School and dealt with a variety of issues including dating, divorce, alcohol abuse, and friendship. The show played heavily into ...                See full summary »

name: Fish Tank
summary_text: Everything changes for 15-year-old Mia when her mum brings home a new boyfriend.

name: Analyze This
summary_text: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number one patient is an insecure mob boss.

name: Slalom
summary_text: Under the guidance of a strict ex champion, a promising 15 year old girl trains as a professional skiing star.Will she be able to endure the physical and emotional pressures?

name: Hey Dude
summary_text: A group of friends work together with their boss at a dude ranch and go through many fun moments and mishaps along the way.

name: The Golden Glove
summary_text: A serial killer strikes fear in the hearts of residents of Hamburg during the early 1970s.

name: Kyle XY
summary_text: A family takes in a formerly institutionalized teen savant who is missing standard human behaviors such as anger, joy, and love.

name: The Walking Dead: Red Machete
summary_text: Follow the path of the red-handled weapon used by Rick Grimes to kill Terminus leader Gareth; from its innocent beginnings on a hardware store shelf at the start of the apocalypse into the hands of various survivors, familiar and new.

name: Love Advent
summary_text: On each day of the advent, LOVE magazine releases a short film starring an A-list model.

name: We Bare Bears
summary_text: Three bear brothers do whatever they can to be a part of human society by doing what everyone around them does.

name: Young Royals
summary_text: Prince Wilhelm adjusts to life at his prestigious new boarding school, Hillerska, but following his heart proves more challenging than anticipated.

name: Between Worlds
summary_text: Joe meets a mother who can contact spirits when suffocating. Her daughter is dying when Joe helps the mother spiritually contact the daughter and save her. Unfortunately, the spirit in the daughter's body is now that of Joe's dead wife.

name: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
summary_text: Frank Drebin (Leslie Nielsen) comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

name: The Get Down
summary_text: A ragtag group of teenagers run wild in the streets of the Bronx in the late 1970s.

name: My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU
summary_text: About an antisocial high school student named Hikigaya Hachiman with a distorted view on life and no friends or girlfriend. His life change when he was forced to enter the "Volunteer Service Club" by his teacher.

name: Eat Wheaties!
summary_text: Sid Straw's life unravels as he tries to prove that he was friends with a celebrity in college.

name: My Awkward Sexual Adventure
summary_text: To win back his ex-girlfriend, a conservative accountant enlists the help of an exotic dancer to guide him on a quest for sexual experience, leading him into a world of strip clubs, sensual massage parlors, cross-dressing and S & M.

name: Dhar Mann
summary_text: Short, motivational videos focused on life, business, and relationships These compelling stories depict real life situations shown by actors that teach important life lessons, inspired by ...                See full summary »

name: The Thing from Another World
summary_text: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

name: Mr Selfridge
summary_text: Centers on the real-life story of the flamboyant and visionary American founder of Selfridge's, London's department store.

name: Back to Life
summary_text: After 18 years behind bars, Miri Matteson returns home and stumbles back into adult life in the claustrophobic coastal town she once knew in this half-hour comedy series.

name: Outlander
summary_text: During the reign of the Vikings, Kainan, a man from a far-off world, crash lands on Earth, bringing with him an alien predator known as the Moorwen. Though both man and monster are seeking revenge for violence committed against them, Kainan leads the alliance to kill the Moorwen by fusing his advanced technology with the Viking's Iron Age weaponry.

name: The Me You Can't See
summary_text: Oprah Winfrey and Prince Harry join forces to guide honest discussions about mental health.

name: Blood
summary_text: Cat Hogan returns to West Meath upon her mother's sudden death - she has an accident at home and died (or was it an accident?). Blood is about old secrets, older betrayals, mind games and the lies family tell each other.

name: Kung Pow: Enter the Fist
summary_text: A rough-around-the-edges martial arts master seeks revenge for his parents' death.

name: Something in the Rain
summary_text: Yoon Jin Ah is a woman in her mid-30s who doesn't know yet what it's like to date a man. She's been dumped by a man many times because of her clumsy, reckless and foolish behavior. And ...                See full summary »

name: Muppets Most Wanted
summary_text: While on a grand world tour, The Muppets find themselves wrapped into an European jewel-heist caper headed by a Kermit the Frog look-alike and his dastardly sidekick.

name: Byzantium
summary_text: Residents of a coastal town learn, with deathly consequences, the secret shared by the two mysterious women who have sought shelter at a local resort.

name: Once Bitten
summary_text: A vampire Countess needs to drink the blood of a virgin in order to keep her eternal beauty. It seems that all is hopeless, until she bumps into Mark Kendall.

name: Now You See Me 3
summary_text: A third installment of the 'Now You See Me' franchise. Plot undisclosed.

name: 2 Days in the Valley
summary_text: 48 hours of intersecting lives and crimes in Los Angeles.

name: Dangerous Lies
summary_text: When a wealthy elderly man dies and unexpectedly leaves his estate to his new caregiver, she's drawn into a web of deception and murder. If she's going to survive, she'll have to question everyone's motives - even the people she loves.

name: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
summary_text: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

name: The Cutting Edge
summary_text: A temperamental figure skater and a former hockey player try to win Olympic gold as a figure skating pairs team.

name: Colette
summary_text: Colette is pushed by her husband to write novels under his name. Upon their success, she fights to make her talents known, challenging gender norms.

name: Prison School
summary_text: Hachimitsu Academy, once an all-girls school, has become co-ed, and teen Kiyoshi is one of five boys to enroll. When he is caught peeping, Kiyoshi is sent to the schools prison, where his punishment is carried out.

name: Breathless
summary_text: When Jesse Lujack steals a car in Las Vegas and drives down to LA, his criminal ways only escalate - but when will it end?

name: Camp
summary_text: After a series of Broadway flops, songwriter Bert Hanley (Dixon) goes to work at a musical camp for young performers. Inspired by the kids, he finds an opportunity to regain success by staging an altogether new production.

name: Chance
summary_text: A forensic neuro-psychiatrist reluctantly enters a dangerous and violent world of mistaken identity, police corruption and mental illness.

name: The African Queen
summary_text: In WWI Africa, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

name: The Last Song
summary_text: A rebellious girl is sent to a Southern beach town for the summer to stay with her father. Through their mutual love of music, the estranged duo learn to reconnect.

name: Duck Butter
summary_text: Two women, who are dissatisfied with the dishonesty they see in dating and relationships, decide to make a pact to spend 24 hours together hoping to find a new way to create intimacy.

name: The Prince and Me
summary_text: At college Paige meets Eddie, a fellow student from Denmark, whom she first dislikes but later accepts, likes, and loves; he proves to be Crown Prince Edvard. Paige follows him to Copenhagen, and he follows her back to school with a plan.

name: Cannon
summary_text: Frank Cannon is an overweight, balding ex-cop with a deep voice and expensive tastes in culinary pleasures; he becomes a high-priced private investigator.

name: Freeway
summary_text: A twisted take on "Little Red Riding Hood", with a teenage juvenile delinquent on the run from a social worker travelling to her grandmother's house and being hounded by a charming, but sadistic, serial killer and pedophile.

name: Love on the Spectrum
summary_text: A four-part documentary series following young adults on the autism spectrum as they explore the unpredictable world of love, dating and relationships.

name: The Missing
summary_text: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

name: Snatched
summary_text: When her boyfriend dumps her before their exotic vacation, a young woman persuades her ultra-cautious mother to travel with her to paradise, with unexpected results.

name: Polaroid
summary_text: High school loner Bird Fitcher has no idea what dark secrets are tied to the Polaroid camera she finds. It doesn't take long to discover that those who have their picture taken with it, soon die.

name: The Man with the Iron Fists
summary_text: On the hunt for a fabled treasure of gold, a band of warriors, assassins, and a rogue British soldier descend upon a village in feudal China, where a humble blacksmith looks to defend himself and his fellow villagers.

name: Son of the South
summary_text: The true story of one young white Southerner in the Summer of 1961, caught in a place and time where he had to choose which side he was on.

name: The Line of Beauty
summary_text: A young man becomes attached to a family that's not his own, and casts himself into the life of plentiful riches and gay love affairs for which he seems destined.

name: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
summary_text: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

name: Prom Night
summary_text: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life, though a sadistic killer from her past has different plans for her and her friends.

name: The Captain
summary_text: In the last moments of World War II, a young German soldier fighting for survival finds a Nazi captain's uniform. Impersonating an officer, the man quickly takes on the monstrous identity of the perpetrators he's escaping from.

name: S.W.A.T.: Under Siege
summary_text: A SWAT compound comes under fire from an international terrorist who relentlessly and violently pursues a mystery man who was apprehended by Seattle SWAT after a raid went horribly wrong.

name: Airwolf
summary_text: As part of a deal with an intelligence agency to look for his missing brother, a renegade pilot goes on missions with an advanced battle helicopter.

name: For Love of the Game
summary_text: After 19 years of playing the game he's loved his whole life, Detroit Tigers pitcher Billy Chapel has to decide if he's going to risk everything and put everything out there.

name: The Rational Life
summary_text: Shen Ruo Xin is a thirty-something professional who decides to take a stand against unfair societal expectations At her workplace she finds herself drawn to two different men - one her ...                See full summary »

name: Aiyaary
summary_text: After finding out about an illegal arms deal, a military intelligence officer goes rogue with highly sensitive data related to his organization, causing his mentor: a colonel, to hunt him down.

name: Jobs
summary_text: The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.

name: Wrong Turn 5: Bloodlines
summary_text: A group of college students, on a trip to the Mountain Man Festival on Halloween in West Virginia, encounter a clan of cannibals.

name: Starman
summary_text: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and makes her drive him across the country. The government tries to stop them.

name: Tart
summary_text: A portrait of the increasingly desperate attempts of a teenage Manhattan girl to find love and kinship, in a world that never reciprocates.

name: A Prophet
summary_text: A young Algerian man is sent to a French prison.

name: Batman: Soul of the Dragon
summary_text: In the 1970s, a missing teacher of martial arts is the subject of a quest by his devoted and brilliant but distant students, who include Batman.

name: Seobok
summary_text: Ex intelligence agent Ki Heon is tasked with safely transporting Seo Bok, the first ever human clone, who holds the secret of eternal life. Several forces try to take control of Seo Bok to serve their own agendas.

name: No Ordinary Love
summary_text: Vulnerability and strength prove vital to a resilient woman who finds herself in a dangerous situation with her police officer husband. When she exposes his secret to her pastor's wife, the...                See full summary »

name: The Good Son
summary_text: A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle and be friends with his cousin, a boy of the same age who shows increasing signs of violent and psychopathic behavior.

name: Redo of Healer
summary_text: "Healing magicians cannot fight alone". Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others. One day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic and was ...                See full summary »

name: Halloween II
summary_text: Laurie Strode struggles to come to terms with her brother Michael's deadly return to Haddonfield, Illinois; meanwhile, Michael prepares for another reunion with his sister.

name: After.Life
summary_text: After a car accident, a young woman caught between life and death meets a funeral director who claims to have the gift of transitioning the dead into the afterlife.

name: Drop Dead Fred
summary_text: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

name: Jason and the Argonauts
summary_text: The legendary Greek hero leads a team of intrepid adventurers in a perilous quest for the legendary Golden Fleece.

name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
summary_text: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

name: The Flash
summary_text: A police forensic scientist, Barry Allen, battles crimes as the super-fast superhero "The Flash".

name: Room 104
summary_text: Anthology series set in room 104 of a seemingly average American motel, telling each time a different story of the assorted guests who pass through, which can range from funny and fantastical to dramatic and horrifying.

name: Married at First Sight
summary_text: A reality show that follows singles yearning for a life-long partnership as they agree to a provocative proposal: getting legally married to a stranger the moment they first meet.

name: SK8 the Infinity
summary_text: Reki, a high school sophomore and skater, is addicted to "S," a highly secret and dangerous downhill skateboarding race that takes place in an abandoned mine. The skaters are especially ...                See full summary »

name: Wildland
summary_text: Ida moves in with her aunt and cousins after the tragic death of her mother in a car accident. The home is filled with love, but outside of the home, the family leads a violent and criminal life.

name: Van der Valk
summary_text: A Dutch detective takes on criminal cases in Amsterdam using insightful human observation and his natural street smarts.

name: Aarya
summary_text: When her world suddenly turns upside down, will Aarya become the very thing she hated?How far will she go to survive and protect her family?

name: Pulse
summary_text: Two groups of people discover evidence that suggests spirits may be trying to invade the human world through the Internet.

name: Vikram Vedha
summary_text: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

name: From Paris with Love
summary_text: In Paris, a young employee in the office of the US Ambassador hooks up with an American spy looking to stop a terrorist attack in the city.

name: Indiana Jones and the Sanctuary of the Black Order
summary_text: 1938. A group of American archaeologists are taken prisoners in the Castle of Wewelsburg. Indiana Jones with Sallah and Husani will travel to the Nazi Vatican, to discover the last and the darkest plan of the Third Reich.

name: Troop Beverly Hills
summary_text: A soon to be divorced Beverly Hills socialite is determined to prove to her husband and herself that she can finish what she starts out to do, by becoming a den mother to a troop of Beverly Hills Girl Scouts.

name: Thelma
summary_text: A confused religious girl tries to deny her feelings for a female friend who's in love with her. This causes her suppressed subconsciously-controlled psychokinetic powers to reemerge with devastating results.

name: Deltopia
summary_text: Deltopia is a coming of age story that takes place over a period of 24 hours. A group of friends from Southern California finish their last day of high school and travel to Santa Barbara for the biggest party of their lives.

name: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After?
summary_text: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? catches up with some of the most memorable couples from 90 Day Fiancé as they now face the next chapter in their marriages.

name: Untitled Star Trek Sequel
summary_text: Plot kept under wraps. The follow-up to Star Trek Beyond (2016).

name: The Nun 2
summary_text: Sequel to the 2018 hit film --- The Nun.

name: One for the Money
summary_text: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

name: Open Water
summary_text: Based on the true story of two scuba divers accidentally stranded in shark infested waters after their tour boat has left.

name: Old Dogs
summary_text: Two friends and business partners find their lives turned upside down when strange circumstances lead them to be the temporary guardians of seven year-old twins.

name: Battle Beyond the Stars
summary_text: A young farmer sets out to recruit mercenaries to defend his peaceful planet, which is under threat of invasion by the evil tyrant Sador and his armada of aggressors.

name: The Two Jakes
summary_text: The sequel to Chinatown (1974) finds J.J. "Jake" Gittes investigating adultery and murder, and the money that comes from oil.

name: Grand Hotel
summary_text: A look at the professional and personal lives of people working at a family-run hotel in Miami Beach.

name: Devil in a Blue Dress
summary_text: An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.

name: June Bride
summary_text: A magazine's staff, including bickering ex-lovers Linda and Carey, cover an Indiana wedding, which goes slightly wrong...

name: A Prayer Before Dawn
summary_text: The true story of an English boxer incarcerated in one of Thailand's most notorious prisons as he fights in Muay Thai tournaments to earn his freedom.

name: Drugstore Cowboy
summary_text: A pharmacy-robbing dope fiend and his crew pop pills and evade the law.

name: Stroker Ace
summary_text: The title character, a popular NASCAR driver, clashes with the fried-chicken mogul that sponsors his racing team.

name: Zombi 2
summary_text: Strangers searching for a young woman's missing father arrive at a tropical island where a doctor desperately seeks the cause and cure of a recent epidemic of the undead.

name: Damnation
summary_text: An epic saga about the secret history of the 1930s American heartland, centering on the mythic conflict and bloody struggle between big money and the downtrodden.

name: Holding the Man
summary_text: The warm, funny and achingly sad story of the 15-year-long love affair between Timothy Conigrave and the boy he fell in love with at high school, John Caleo.

name: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
summary_text: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

name: Vanity Fair
summary_text: An adaptation of the 1848 novel by William Makepeace Thackeray.

name: The Lion in Winter
summary_text: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. They and his wife variously plot to force him.

name: Life of the Party
summary_text: After her husband abruptly asks for a divorce, a middle-aged mother returns to college in order to complete her degree.

name: The Prince of Tides
summary_text: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

name: Wander Darkly
summary_text: New parents Adrienne and Matteo are forced to reckon with trauma amidst their troubled relationship. They must revisit the memories of their past and unravel haunting truths in order to face their uncertain future.

name: How to Train Your Dragon: Homecoming
summary_text: Hiccup and Toothless reunite to remind both their kinds of the inseparable bond between vikings and dragons.

name: Passions
summary_text: In the world of power and money, the wealthy and powerful Crane family rule the town of Harmony from their mansion on Raven Hill.

name: Poor Things
summary_text: The film will be a Victorian tale of love, discovery and scientific daring, Poor Things tells the incredible story of Belle Baxter, a young woman brought back to life by an eccentric but brilliant scientist.

name: LazyTown
summary_text: In this Nick Jr. television show, a pink-haired girl named Stephanie moves to LazyTown with her uncle (the mayor of LazyTown), where she tries to teach its extremely lazy residents that physical activity is beneficial.

name: IO
summary_text: As a young scientist searches for a way to save a dying Earth, she finds a connection with a man who's racing to catch the last shuttle off the planet.

name: The Uncanny Counter
summary_text: Noodle shop employees by day and demon hunters by night, the Counters use special abilities to chase down malevolent spirits that prey on humans.

name: Next Door
summary_text: Explores the subjects of gentrification and social inequality in Berlin.

name: The Salisbury Poisonings
summary_text: Three episode, fact based drama from the BBC, about the 2018 Novichok poisoning crisis in the city of Salisbury.

name: Camelot
summary_text: The story of the marriage of England's King Arthur to Guinevere. The plot of illegitimate Mordred to gain the throne and Guinevere's growing attachment to Sir Lancelot, threaten to topple Arthur and destroy his "round table" of knights.

name: Ghost of Tsushima
summary_text: Set in 1274 on the Tsushima Island, the last samurai, Jin Sakai, must master a new fighting style, the way of the Ghost, to defeat the Mongol forces and fight for the freedom and independence of Japan.

name: Wounds
summary_text: Disturbing and mysterious things begin to happen to a bartender in New Orleans after he picks up a phone left behind at his bar.

name: Rome Adventure
summary_text: Under fire for giving a student her copy of a romance novel, Prudence resigns from her teaching position and sails for Italy.

name: Star
summary_text: A trio of women form a musical group in Atlanta.

name: The American
summary_text: An assassin hides out in Italy for one last assignment.

name: Up in Smoke
summary_text: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

name: Drive Me Crazy
summary_text: Nicole and Chase used to be BFFs, then junior high happened. The high school centennial dance is coming but Nicole gets dumped. So does Chase. They stage a relationship to get at their exes. They visit each other's worlds. Love in the air?

name: Holy Motors
summary_text: From dawn to dusk, a few hours in the shadowy life of a mystic man named Monsieur Oscar.

name: Eagles
summary_text: Eagles revolves around a few teenagers living in the Swedish ice hockey town Oskarshamn while experiencing friendship, love, and rivalry on the ice.

name: Tour of Duty
summary_text: The trials of a U.S. Army platoon serving in the field during the Vietnam War.

name: Nanny McPhee Returns
summary_text: Nanny McPhee arrives to help a harried young mother who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war, though she uses her magic to teach the woman's children and their two spoiled cousins five new lessons.

name: Attila
summary_text: A romanced story of Attila the Hun (Gerard Butler), from when he lost his parents in childhood until his death. Attila is disclosed as a great leader, strategist, and lover and the movie ...                See full summary »

name: We Are Your Friends
summary_text: Caught between a forbidden romance and the expectations of his friends, aspiring DJ Cole Carter attempts to find the path in life that leads to fame and fortune.

name: In Her Shoes
summary_text: Strait-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed.

name: Code 404
summary_text: A British detective killed in action is brought back to life using experimental Artificial Intelligence.

name: The Transporter Refueled
summary_text: In the south of France, former special-ops mercenary Frank Martin enters into a game of chess with a femme-fatale and her three sidekicks who are looking for revenge against a sinister Russian kingpin.

name: Vision Quest
summary_text: A high school wrestler in Spokane, Washington has trouble focusing on his training regimen when a beautiful young drifter takes up temporary residence at his home.

name: Hannah and Her Sisters
summary_text: Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

name: Dorohedoro
summary_text: In a sad town a clan of sorcerers use its people to experiment with the dark arts.

name: Better Luck Tomorrow
summary_text: A group of over-achieving Asian-American high school seniors enjoy a power trip when they dip into extra-curricular criminal activities.

name: Son of the Mask
summary_text: Tim Avery, an aspiring cartoonist, finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son "born of the mask", he discovers just how looney child raising can be.

name: Moriarty the Patriot
summary_text: William James Moriarty lives as a regular noble while also being a consultant for the common folk to solve their problems. However, deep inside him lies a desire to destroy the current structure that dominates British society.

name: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
summary_text: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the horrible events of Hellraiser (1987), where the occult-obsessive head doctor resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites and their demonic underworld.

name: The Best of Enemies
summary_text: Civil rights activist Ann Atwater faces off against C.P. Ellis, Exalted Cyclops of the Ku Klux Klan, in 1971 Durham, North Carolina over the issue of school integration.

name: 100 Girls
summary_text: Matt spends the night with a girl in an elevator during power outage in a girls' college dorm. He never sees her. Waking up in the morning, panties are all that's left of her. How does he find her in a building with 100 girls?

name: Wonder Park
summary_text: Wonder Park tells the story of an amusement park where the imagination of a wildly creative girl named June comes alive.

name: Kicking & Screaming
summary_text: Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon finds that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating.

name: Starcrash
summary_text: An outlaw smuggler and her alien companion are recruited by the Emperor of the Galaxy to rescue his son and destroy a secret weapon by the evil Count Zarth Arn.

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse 2
summary_text: Plot unknown. Sequel to the 2018 film 'Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse'.

name: The Rocker
summary_text: In the 1980s, a drummer is abandoned by his band just before they become rock superstars. Twenty years later, the drummer sees his second chance at stardom arise when he is asked to perform with his teenage nephew's high school rock band.

name: The Nun 2
summary_text: In a small town in 1954 in Romania, a young dog is hunted by a demonic nun.

name: Losing Alice
summary_text: Fascination spirals into Faustian bargain after an ambitious female film director meets-and obsesses over-a younger femme-fatale screenwriter.

name: The Haunted Mansion
summary_text: A realtor and his wife and children are summoned to a mansion, which they soon discover is haunted, and while they attempt to escape, he learns an important lesson about the family he has neglected.

name: Shimoneta: A Boring World Where the Concept of Dirty Jokes Doesn't Exist
summary_text: Tanukichi Okuma is roped into joining an obscene terrorist organization bent on the destruction of everything that his new school stands for, the most prestigious public morals school.

name: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
summary_text: A town's Sheriff and regular patron of a historical whorehouse fights to keep it running when a television reporter targets it as the Devil's playhouse.

name: Rebus
summary_text: Set in Edinburgh, the mercurial Detective Inspector John Rebus's investigations lead him through the city's ancient beauty and into its more sinister quarters.

name: A Midsummer Night's Dream
summary_text: Lovers' lives are complicated by city law, feuding faerie royalty, and... love.

name: Sliding Doors
summary_text: A London woman's love life and career both hinge, unknown to her, on whether or not she catches a train. We see it both ways, in parallel.

name: Dora the Explorer
summary_text: Along with her friend Monkey Boots, Dora goes on adventures.

name: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives
summary_text: Tommy Jarvis goes to the graveyard to get rid of Jason Voorhees' body once and for all, but inadvertently brings him back to life instead. The newly revived killer once again seeks revenge, and Tommy may be the only one who can defeat him.

name: Jeepers Creepers 2
summary_text: Set a few days after the original, a championship basketball team's bus is attacked by The Creeper, the winged, flesh-eating terror, on the last day of his 23-day feeding frenzy.

name: Horsemen
summary_text: A recently widowed detective still grieving over his wife's death discovers a shocking connection between a serial killing spree and the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.

name: Goblin Slayer
summary_text: In a fantasy world, a lone hero makes his living by exterminating all goblins he encounters. But one day he meets a friend, and his life begins to become more intense.

name: Brain on Fire
summary_text: A young, capable professional cannot explain her newly erratic behavior.

name: The Thinning
summary_text: In a future, overcrowded, dystopian society, students with the lowest test scores are culled. Two students discover errors with the test.

name: Date Movie
summary_text: Spoof of romantic comedies which focuses on a man, his crush, his parents, and her father.

name: Mermaids
summary_text: An unconventional single mother relocates with her two daughters to a small Massachusetts town in 1963, where a number of events and relationships both challenge and strengthen their familial bonds.

name: Street Kings
summary_text: An undercover cop, disillusioned by the death of his wife, is implicated in the murder of an officer and must struggle to clear himself.

name: Temple Grandin
summary_text: A biopic of Temple Grandin, an autistic woman who has become one of the top scientists in the humane livestock handling industry.

name: Pups
summary_text: Rebellious teenager Stevie finds his mother's gun, and along with his girlfriend impulsively decides to rob a bank. The pair find themselves in over their heads as they take hostages and the FBI negotiates Stevie's absurd demands.

name: Pistol
summary_text: Based on the memoir of Steve Jones, the legendary Sex Pistols guitarist who helped usher in a punk revolution in Britain.

name: The Legend of Bagger Vance
summary_text: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddy.

name: Dark Air with Terry Carnation
summary_text: Fictional podcast that explores the on and off-air life of Terry Carnation, host of a late-night, AM radio talk show on the paranormal.

name: Dopesick
summary_text: The series takes viewers to the epicenter of America's struggle with opioid addiction, from the boardrooms of Purdue Pharma, to a distressed Virginia mining community, to the hallways of the DEA.

name: Spy Kids 4: All the Time in the World
summary_text: A retired spy is called back into action, and to bond with her new step-children, she invites them along for the adventure to stop the evil Timekeeper from taking over the world.

name: Yes, Dear
summary_text: Yes, Dear is a comedy about two young couples and their outrageously contrasting views on parenting.

name: Kin
summary_text: Chased by a vengeful criminal, the feds and a gang of otherworldly soldiers, an ex-con and his adopted teenage brother go on the run with a weapon of mysterious origin as their only protection.

name: Bernie
summary_text: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp.

name: Zootopia+
summary_text: The adventures of the creatures of the most incredible metropolis: Zootopia.

name: The Hills Have Eyes 2
summary_text: A group of National Guard trainees find themselves battling against a vicious group of mutants on their last day of training in the desert.

name: Step Up All In
summary_text: All-stars from the previous Step Up installments come together in glittering Las Vegas, battling for a victory that could define their dreams and their careers.

name: Cruel Intentions
summary_text: Fifteen years after the death of her brother, villainous Kathryn Merteuil seeks to manipulate her nephew, Bash, and gain control of the family business Valmont International.

name: Mortal Kombat 11
summary_text: When a time lord starts merging past with the present, versions of heroes from both Mortal Kombat timelines must unite to right past wrongs and save the world.

name: The Normal Heart
summary_text: A gay activist attempts to raise H.I.V. and A.I.D.S. awareness during the early 1980s.

name: Let It Snow
summary_text: In a small town on Christmas Eve, a snowstorm brings together a group of young people.

name: Tell Me Who I Am
summary_text: After losing his memory in an accident, Alex Lewis trusts his twin brother, Marcus, to tell him about his past only to discover that he's hiding a dark secret about their childhood.

name: Shanghai Knights
summary_text: When a Chinese rebel murders Chon's estranged father and escapes to England, Chon and Roy make their way to London with revenge on their minds.

name: The Lost Symbol
summary_text: This follows the early adventures of famed Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon, who finds himself pulled into a series of deadly puzzles when his mentor is kidnapped. The CIA forces him onto...                See full summary »

name: House Party
summary_text: Kid decides to go to his friend Play's house party, but neither of them can predict what's in store for them on what could be the wildest night of their lives.

name: Over the Edge
summary_text: A group of bored teenagers rebel against authority in the community of New Granada after the death of one of their own.

name: Child's Play 3
summary_text: Chucky returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy who defeated him, and now a teenager living in a military academy.

name: Friday the 13th Part III
summary_text: Having revived from his wounds, Jason Voorhees takes refuge at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds arrive for their vacation, Jason continues his killing spree.

name: A Father's Legacy
summary_text: A young man sets out to find the father he never knew.

name: Land of the Lost
summary_text: A family is thrown back in time and must survive in a dinosaur dominated land.

name: To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love You
summary_text: Lara Jean and Peter have just taken their relationship from pretend to officially official when another recipient of one of her old love letters enters the picture.

name: The Squid and the Whale
summary_text: Follows two young boys dealing with their parents' divorce in Brooklyn in the 1980s.

name: Breathless
summary_text: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.

name: Mortal Kombat: Legacy
summary_text: The first season of Mortal Kombat: Legacy is a prequel to the original game, explaining the background stories of several characters from the series and demonstrating their reasons for ...                See full summary »

name: Gandii Baat
summary_text: Scintillating stories of murder mysteries all under the genre of erotic thriller. With characters bordering on the psychopath tendencies, the stories this season dwell upon the plethora of emotions that prompt crimes of passion.

name: Love, Guaranteed
summary_text: To save her small law firm, earnest lawyer Susan takes a high-paying case from Nick, a charming new client who wants to sue a dating website that guarantees love. But as the case heats up, so do Susan and Nick's feelings for each other.

name: Driven
summary_text: A resilient girl with a tragic past and a heart of gold falls in love with a bad boy race car driver.

name: American Pickers
summary_text: Mike and Frank are pickers that travel the country and literally would go anywhere just for the prospects of finding antique gold. With the assistance of Danielle they often find themselves in a comedic pickle.

name: Masters of Horror
summary_text: Anchor Bay has amassed some of the greatest horror film writers and directors to bring to you the anthology series, "Masters of Horror". For the first time, the foremost names in the horror...                See full summary »

name: Walking Tall
summary_text: A former U.S. soldier returns to his hometown to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which prompts him to clean house.

name: Broadway Melody of 1938
summary_text: Steve Raleigh wants to produce a show on Broadway. He finds a backer, Herman Whipple and a leading lady, Sally Lee, however his wife Caroline Whipple forces Steve to use a known star, not a...                See full summary »

name: Tamara Drewe
summary_text: A young newspaper writer returns to her hometown in the English countryside, where her childhood home is being prepped for sale.

name: Reprisal
summary_text: A bank manager haunted by a violent heist that took the life of a coworker teams up with his ex-cop neighbor to bring down the assailant, initiating an explosive counterattack that brings all three men to the breaking point.

name: Bringing Out the Dead
summary_text: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.

name: House of Payne
summary_text: A multi-generational family lives together under one roof.

name: The Killer in My Backyard
summary_text: After purchasing a house, Allyson and her fiancé Eric decide to rent out the guest house to cover the cost of some expenses. Joshua arrives willing to put up a hefty rent for a short stay, ...                See full summary »

name: Surf's Up
summary_text: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

name: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
summary_text: Captain Nathan Brittles, on the eve of retirement, takes out a last patrol to stop an impending massive Indian attack. Encumbered by women who must be evacuated, Brittles finds his mission imperiled.

name: Internal Affairs
summary_text: An Internal Affairs agent becomes obsessed with bringing down a cop who has managed to maintain a spotless reputation despite being involved in a web of corruption.

name: True Story
summary_text: When disgraced New York Times reporter Michael Finkel meets accused killer Christian Longo - who has taken on Finkel's identity - his investigation morphs into a game of cat-and-mouse.

name: Paranormal
summary_text: Set in the 1960s, the series, packed with mystery and suspense, depicts the adventures of PARANORMAL leading character Dr. Refaat Ismail, a single hematologist who finds himself faced with a series of supernatural events.

name: Highlander: Endgame
summary_text: Immortals Connor and Duncan MacLeod must join forces against Kell, an evil immortal who has become too strong for anyone to face alone.

name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show: Let's Do the Time Warp Again
summary_text: A straitlaced, square couple, seeking shelter from a storm, find themselves in the castle of a transgender alien mad scientist intent on creating a buff bodybuilder.

name: Summer '03
summary_text: A 16-year-old girl and her extended family are left reeling after her calculating grandmother unveils an array of secrets on her deathbed.

name: The Duchess
summary_text: A chronicle of the life of 18th-century aristocrat Georgiana, Duchess of Devonshire, who was reviled for her extravagant political and personal life.

name: East of Eden
summary_text: Two brothers struggle to maintain their strict, Bible-toting father's favor.
